KrhmsYO7EHn8GhgXyUb6Ng.review_text: This is for the Tiki Bar at the back of the Players Bar and Grill on Pier 39. Service was amazing, views of the Bay Bridge and Alcatraz were incredible. They have a pretty good beer on tap selection, and the bartender, Shayn, made great cocktails as well. Definitely recommend it for the view and the service - just go to the Players Bar and find your way to the very back. Seriously though, it's in the very back of the place, through a full arcade, and its worth finding your way back there.
